9717.quoteText: Our privacy policy was last updated June 27th 2020
9717.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

9718.quoteText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time, but in the case that happens you will be notified at least seven days in advance
9718.title: When the service wants to change its terms, users are notified a week or more in advance.

tosdr.case: When the service wants to change its terms, users are notified a week or more in advance.

9719.quoteText: We will never comply with any voluntary surveillance program
9719.title: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis

tosdr.case: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis

9720.quoteText:
<li>In the unlikely event we're ever contacted by a government agency with a legal request for your data, we may be required to hand over information such as your forum posting history.
Unless we are prohibited by law or by court order from doing so, we will notify you of the request and provide you with a copy of the subpoena, court order, or warrant so that you can challenge the legal process if you wish.
9720.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify users regarding government inquiries that may involve users' personal data

tosdr.case: The service promises to inform and/or notify users regarding government inquiries that may involve users' personal data

9721.quoteText: <li>If you break our code of conduct we reserve the right to suspend your account.
9721.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

tosdr.case: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

9722.quoteText: You will be notified and we'll provide clear reasoning, and we hope to work with you to resolve the problem so your account can be reactivated.
9722.title: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.

tosdr.case: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.

9723.quoteText: You maintain full ownership of your data
9723.title: You maintain ownership of your data

tosdr.case: You maintain ownership of your data

9725.quoteText: We aim to embed using the highest privacy settings to protect your privacy, which means we embed using "dnt on" for Twitter, "No Cookie" for YouTube, and dnt=1 for Vimeo
9725.title: This service respects your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers

tosdr.case: This service respects your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers

9726.quoteText: We do not track you on this site or any others, and we do not pass your data to any third party.
9726.title: This service does not track you

tosdr.case: This service does not track you

9727.quoteText: We serve you with a cookie that tracks your session on the site. This is used only for users who have logged into the site, so we can track who is posting forum messages and allow you to edit or delete your posts later on. If you visit our Swift coding tests you will be served an extra cookie that tracks the answer you write for each question so that we can show the test result at the end.
9727.title: The service provides a complete list of all cookies set by its website

tosdr.case: The service provides a complete list of all cookies set by its website

9728.quoteText: Existing customers and those who have subscribed for updates will receive emails containing product updates, discount links on books, news, and more. You can unsubscribe from these at any time using the link at the end of any email.
9728.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

9729.quoteText: If you are still unsure, you can read more about their privacy policies here: Twitter, YouTube, and Vimeo
9729.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information

tosdr.case: The service refers users to external documents for more information

9730.quoteText: Our CDN is Cloudflare, and they may include cookies with our pages to provide a better service
9730.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics
